University of St Andrews Degree Calculator

Confused by the University of St Andrews' baroque and obtuse grading scheme? Just want to know what degree classification you're going to get? Want to know what you need in your dissertation to scrape that 2-2?

Totally understandable. You aren't alone. This handy calculator will help. Just put in your module grades and the number of credits they're worth in the boxes. Then hit the big ol' CALCULATE! button, and you'll find your answer! Got any questions? Check the FAQ.
